QuestData.Title: Return the Comb
QuestData.Description: NO!!!!!$B$BTake it, take this comb away from me!$B$BI'm a monster, and no one will ever think me lovely again!
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the Ghost Hair Comb to Madame Eva in Darkshire.
QuestData.CompletionText: I sense that you have seen Blind Mary. You have my comb...?
QuestData.RewardText: I can make a spool of ghost hair thread with this, and have a few strands to spare. Here are some coins for those extra strands.
